captions.text:
If winner stays on, I guess
I'm Cristiano Ronaldo then.

So, I have 50,000 fans
screaming my name.

Well, I have boots that
aren't even out yet!

Neymar is going strong,
beautiful move.

Gets past a crowd of defenders,
Pique arrives!
You don't look like David Luiz.

Zlatan thinks that
Zlatan should take it.
Get back, come on, come on.

It goes straight to
Wayne Rooney.

The Englishman has
scored into the top corner.

Thiago Silva in
the field of attack.

Cristiano beautiful pass,
go, kid, go!

He's going to do it!
David Luiz gets there!

They're going to
give the penalty.

he's taking the ball off
Cristiano Ronaldo.

title: Nike Football: Winner Stays. ft. Ronaldo, Neymar Jr., Rooney, Ibrahimović, Iniesta & more
